item.title: Breathwork Slow - Let Go
item.description:
Plug in your headphones and play!

 

Click here:

https://breathewithbrian.wistia.com/medias/qw3su0mhla

 

“Let go” is a Triangle breath meditation to unwind built up stressors and transform any physical or mental energy to calmness, leaving you recentered (permission to let go).

 

When to Use:

- When negative thoughts are to loud

- To reduce any negative impact from things outside of your control

- Release built up stressors both physically and emotionally

- After a busy and challenging day

- If your world is feeling chaotic

- To shift from a state of anxiety and stress to peace

- To train the parasympathetic response

 

Time: 10:48

 

Breathing Pattern: Nose & Mouth (Triangle Down Regulation)

item.title: Breathwork Slow - Heart Gratitude
item.description:
Plug in your headphones and play!

 

Click here:

https://breathewithbrian.wistia.com/medias/uakn4e2qdg

 

“Heart Gratitude” is a down regulating breath meditation which opens true connection to your heart and allows for deep connection. Receive wisdom and knowledge from the heart whilst activating the parasympathetic division.

 

When to Use:

- When needing to lower stress levels in the body

- Release muscular stiffness by decreasing heart rate

- When feeling disconnected

- To shift from a state of anger to peace

- For self care and enhanced wellbeing

 

Time: 9:36

Breathing Pattern: Nose & Mouth (slow)

item.title: Breathwork Slow - Box Breath Detox
item.description:
Plug in your headphones and play!

 

Click here:

https://breathewithbrian.wistia.com/medias/eb5sdx059x

 

“Box breath detox” is a breath meditation and well known technique used by elite forces to lower heart rate, reduce stress, panic and activate the parasympathetic division. It can create a focussed and clear the mind also Aiding  in  recovery,  this technique is Greta to reground after hitting the fight or flight response helping to eliminate any long term health issues and can be practiced regularly .

 

When to Use:

- Helps to reduce any tension or anxiety, releasing built up stressors

- Train the rest response

- Enhanced focus and improve mood

- Prior to any challenging situation

- For improved sports performance

- When needing to anchor back into the body dealing

- Manage High stress or panic and calm everything down

- For improving long term health


Time: 7:57


Breathing Pattern: Nose

item.title: Breathwork Slow - 9D Nidra
item.description:
Plug in your headphones and play!

 

Click here:

https://9d.9dbreathwork.com/time-to-get-some-rest

 

When to Use:

 

Time: 26:18

Breathing Pattern: Nasal Sleep

 

"9D Nidra" is your evening practice specially crafted to guide you into a state of profound relaxation and tranquility before sleep. This unique practice helps to set a new sleep code and serves as a tool to silence the monkey minds chattering, whilst resting at delta brainwaves states the bodies amazing healing technologies go to work supporting recovery at the deepest levels. Dissolving the stress from the day activities 9d Nidra opens the gateway to growing inner peace to help maintain a healthy balanced lifestyle. unwind after a long day, and treat yourself to a deep restful sleep in preparation for the day ahead.

item.title: Breathwork Slow - Relax Not React
item.description:
Plug in your headphones and play!

 

Click here:

https://9d.9dbreathwork.com/react-not-reactoral

 

When to Use:

 

Time: 3:34

Breathing Pattern: Nose

 

A short all coherent nasal breath meditation used to unwind physical and emotional energy. Best used either when you feel you’re reacting angrily to a situation or simply to help finish your day at school or work to relax and unwind. Breathe this pattern to slow down and re-calibrate the nervous system. Aim to breathe this pattern often and re train the nervous system.- shifting from the sympathetic into the parasympathetic or rest response metabolizes both physical and emotional stressors, transforming the energy.- Deep coherent breathing lowers stress in the body by telling brain to calm down and relax- decreases heart rate, blood pressure, stiff muscles, digestive issues and sensations of anger- quickly transforms anxiety and stress to peace and calmness in just a 1 and a half minutes of breathing

item.title: Breathwork Slow - Breathe and Create Space
item.description:
Plug in your headphones and play!

Click here:

https://9d.9dbreathwork.com/breath-n-create-space

"Breathe & Create Space" is a 5-minute guided breathwork session to soothe your mind and bring a sense of calm and tranquility.

When to Use:

 

Time: 6:18

Breathing Pattern: Nose

 

- When feeling anxious or stressed about upcoming tasks.

- Before sleep to ease into a restful state, free from the day's stress.

- When feeling tension build up in your body or mind.

- After a day filled with overwhelm, for a soothing reset.

- During a short break for a mental reset.

- To interrupt and calm anxious thoughts before they escalate.

item.title: Breathwork Go - Fast in Four
item.description:
Plug in your headphones and play!

 

Click here:

https://9d.9dbreathwork.com/fastin4

 

When to Use:
Time: 5:19

Breathing Pattern: Dynamic Nose & Mouth

 

A short all coherent nasal breath meditation used to unwind physical and emotional energy. Best used either when you feel you’re reacting angrily to a situation or simply to help finish your day at school or work to relax and unwind.

 

Breathe this pattern to slow down and re-calibrate the nervous system. Aim to breathe this pattern often and retrain the nervous system.

 

- shifting from the sympathetic into the parasympathetic or rest response metabolizes both physical and emotional stressors, transforming the energy.

- Deep coherent breathing lowers stress in the body by telling brain to calm down and relax

- decreases heart rate, blood pressure, stiff muscles, digestive issues and sensations of anger

- quickly transforms anxiety and stress to peace and calmness in just a 1 and a half minutes of breathing

item.title: Breathwork Go - Zen Breath
item.description:
Plug in your headphones and play!

 

Click here:

https://9d.9dbreathwork.com/zen-breath

 

"Zen Breath" is a short and potent activation that ignites your readiness for action, leaving you focused and equipped to tackle the day's challenges. This session is designed to enhance lung fitness, providing a powerful boost that elevates your mood.

 

When to Use:

 

Time: 5:32

Breathing Pattern: Mouth

 

-Start your day or recharge when energy levels are low.

- Expand your diaphragm and increase lung capacity.

-Practice breath-holding.

-Prepare your mind and body for peak performance.

-Boost energy levels and uplift mood.

-Enhance performance, attention, and vigilance.

-Use before sports matches, tests, or exams.

-Anytime you need a quick power-up to conquer the day.

item.title: Breathwork Go - Fresh Morning Kickstart
item.description:
Plug in your headphones and play!

 

Click here:

https://9d.9dbreathwork.com/fresh-morning-kickstart

 

"Fresh Morning Kickstart" energizes your day, sparking motivation and positivity for a productive start.

 

When to Use:

 

Time: 9:18

Breathing Pattern: Mouth & Holds

 

- When waking up feeling sluggish or unmotivated.

- To set a positive tone for the day ahead.

- Before tackling a busy or demanding schedule.

- If you need inspiration for creative tasks or problem-solving.

- To boost your mood and energy on a slow-starting morning.

- Anytime you want to embrace the day with renewed vigor and enthusiasm.

item.title: Breathwork Go - Rapid Recharge
item.description:
Plug in your headphones and play!

Click here:

https://9d.9dbreathwork.com/rapid-recharge

The "10:20:30 Rapid Recharge" offers a swift energy boost, enhancing focus and calming thoughts in just minutes.

When to Use:

 

Time: 8:42

Breathing Pattern: Mouth & Holds

 

- When you need a quick boost of energy to tackle your tasks.

- To quiet an overactive mind and regain focus.

- Before a test or exam to clear your thoughts and enhance concentration.

- Prior to a presentation for a burst of confidence and clarity.

- When transitioning between activities and needing to refocus.

- Anytime you feel mental fatigue and require a swift revitalization.
